channel.title: Technical sports on Savakar Rohan's site
channel.description: Recent content in Technical sports on Savakar Rohan's site

item.title: Badminton Racket peculiar design
item.description: The world of sports is amazing, everyone is on a level playing field following the same set of rules and a participant or team attempts to do their best. In my personal opinion it’s the perfect substitution to war. Much like how countries spend billions in their respective armed forces and technologies, sportspeople too spend their time finding that advantage over their opponent. I believe this is the primary reason why technology develops first in the armed forces and then quickly follows in to the world of sports.
